task.summary: Made the fading a lot smoother
Fixed a bunch of a problems
Hopefully finally fixed that scrolling bug
Made a slight mistake with the last bugfix
Updated level 5 with a few decorations n stuff
Had a bash at fixing a bug with the scrolling
Removed prints now that I have devised a solution
All sprites now set their initial position differently
Hacked a bugfix, to be improved at a later date
Added lots of decorations to level 5
